      • changeConfig

        public static boolean changeConfig(java.lang.String config)
        Change the configuration of serial parameter. Note: Refer "115200,8,n,1"
        Parameters:
        config - the format config is: "baudrate,databits,parity,stopbits".
        Returns:
        returned true if success else false.

      • readData

        public byte readData(int timeout)
              throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Receive one byte of data.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout for receiving data.(ms)
        Returns:
        return one byte of data received.
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - A exception will be thrown when receiving data has timed out.

      • writeData

        public int writeData(byte[] data)
        Send data.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to send.
        Returns:
        return 0 if success, other if failed.

      • resetPort

        public void resetPort()
        Reset the communication port. Clear all data in the serial port receive buffer.
